# Where HR and Finance move as one

Meet Jisr: A new-age platform for growing businesses to scale HR processes, manage talent and control spend.

[REQUEST A DEMO](https://jisr.net/en/request-demo)

Trusted by 4500+ HR and Finance teams in Saudi Arabia

## End the silos, bridge HR and Finance with Jisr

properties.content:
Employing innovative HR Solutions for your company's success

With an expert team, regional experience, and the latest technologies, Menaitech is your reliable partner for affordable, easy, and localized cloud-based HR software systems and solutions.

MenaAcademy

Explore Menaitechâ€™s Academy! Gain skills and expertise in HR solutions and certifications and master our innovative solutions. We offer specialized training on Menaitechâ€™s payroll and personnel management (MenaPAY) and talent management (Curio) systems, earning you industry-recognized certificates and a career boost.

Mudad Platform

MenaPay system integration with Mudadâ€™s payroll platform allows Menaitechâ€™s clients in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia to comply with the Wage Protection System (WPS) and the General Organization for Social Insurance (GOSI) regulations.

Menaitech is now proudly ISO/IEC 27001:2022 certified!

Achieving International Recognition in Information Security and Data Protection.

A Sure Formula

Empowering HR, payroll, and talent management tools that will take your organization to excellence.

company.about:
In a fast-paced world, Labayh offers a comprehensive online solution for individuals and businesses prioritizing mental health.

For Individuals - Elevating Healing Journeys
Privacy, Quality, Security: A safe haven for healing.
Round-the-Clock Therapy: Connect with licensed therapists 24/7.
Tailored Therapy Programs: Affordable programs for emotional resilience.
Assess, Connect, Heal: Precise therapist matches through assessments.
Track Progress: Mood tracker for self-awareness and growth.

Labayh Business - Empowering Workplace Well-being
Customized Solutions: Counseling, coaching, consultations, content library.
Elevate Productivity: Foster strong relationships and well-being culture.
Labayh signifies more than a platform; it's a path to enhance well-being. For individuals and organizations, Labayh is your guide to a healthier, happier tomorrow.
